attributes.action: To Cancel NHS Fees charged to Foreign and Migrant NHS and Care Staff
attributes.additional_details:
The NHS and Care Home industry could not function without the significant contribution made by Foreign and Migrant workers.

The COVID-19 pandemic proved the high reliance we have on these foreign and Migrant workers (and their supporting families).

It has been unfortunate that such a high proportion of the deaths in the NHS and Care staff were people of BAME and foreign extraction.
attributes.background:
To abolish the requirement that NHS Fees are charged for NHS and Care Staff and their families.

The Home Secretary should ensure that it becomes a statutory requirement that any such charges should be scrapped.

rejection.details:
